body.p: We the undersigned policemen of the city of Louisville would respectfully state to Your Excellency- that Napoleon Roberts convicted in the Jefferson Circuit Court and George & Scott Roberts indicted in same court for killing one Bell a colored Soldier in May last are industrious orderly and well behaved colored people. We would further represent to your Excellency that the difficulty in which Bell lost his life grew out of a previous difficulty between the police of the city and a party of Colored soldiers in which the Roberts' or one of them assisted the police in attempting to arrest the soldiers who were violent & disorderly men.
